wpt.name: GC1QGC9
wpt.desc: Maryland House V--A Micro No More (Ver. 3.0) by Son_of_Mt_Soma, Traditional Cache (1.5/2)
wpt.urlname: Maryland House V--A Micro No More (Ver. 3.0)

groundspeak:cache.groundspeak:name: Maryland House V--A Micro No More (Ver. 3.0)
groundspeak:cache.groundspeak:short_description: A small cache at the Maryland House Rest Stop in Harford County, MD.
groundspeak:cache.groundspeak:long_description:
This is version 3 of the fifth in a series of caches at the Maryland House Rest Stop, and it was the first micro of the five. Version 1 got muggled in Sep 2009. Version 2 disappeared in May 2010. So, Version 3 is now out, and I have upgraded its size to a small cache. The previous four caches are in the woods in this paradise between the lanes of I-95. It is located a little further away from muggle infested areas--hopefully it will last longer as a result. If you have previously found Versions 1 and 2, your are welcomed to register a find with Version 3.
UPDATE (14 Sep 2009): You do not have to take anything apart to find the cache.
UPDATE (26 Sep 2009): Version 1 of this cache disappeared, so now Version 2 is up and running. Version 2 is located a short distant from the location of Version 1. Since this is a new container and location, anyone who found Version 1 is welcomed to come look for Version 2 and log in a new find.
UPDATE (5 Jul 2010): Version 3 is up and running.
groundspeak:cache.groundspeak:encoded_hints: (1) There is a fairly easy way past the holly leaves to get at the cache.

groundspeak:log.groundspeak:text: Quick find on a business trip. TFTC
